trans-unit.source: Code Sample: Key Management
trans-unit.target: Code Sample: Key Management

trans-unit.source: Code Sample: Key Management
trans-unit.target: Code Sample: Key Management

trans-unit.source: This sample illustrates how to update expiring certificates and keys programmatically.
trans-unit.target: This sample illustrates how to update expiring certificates and keys programmatically.

trans-unit.source: It consists of a single <token>ssDev10</token> solution and two projects.
trans-unit.target: It consists of a single <token>ssDev10</token> solution and two projects.

trans-unit.source: One project, <ui>Common</ui>, contains a helper type that simplifies working with the Management Service.
trans-unit.target: One project, <ui>Common</ui>, contains a helper type that simplifies working with the Management Service.

trans-unit.source: The other project (KeyManagement) demonstrates the following:
trans-unit.target: The other project (KeyManagement) demonstrates the following:

trans-unit.source: How to import identity provider and relying party application metadata to <token>firstref_acs</token> using the <token>secondref_acs</token> Management Service.
trans-unit.target: How to import identity provider and relying party application metadata to <token>firstref_acs</token> using the <token>secondref_acs</token> Management Service.

trans-unit.source: How to update <token>secondref_acs</token> using the <token>sercondref_acs</token> Management Service and Windows Identity Foundation to parse and extract the keys to be updated by emulating a metadata change on an identity provider or a relying party application.
trans-unit.target: How to update <token>secondref_acs</token> using the <token>sercondref_acs</token> Management Service and Windows Identity Foundation to parse and extract the keys to be updated by emulating a metadata change on an identity provider or a relying party application.

trans-unit.source: The code for this sample is located in the <ui>KeyManagement</ui> subdirectory of the (C#\Management\KeyManagement) of the <token>ad_acs_code_gallery</token> package.
trans-unit.target: The code for this sample is located in the <ui>KeyManagement</ui> subdirectory of the (C#\Management\KeyManagement) of the <token>ad_acs_code_gallery</token> package.

trans-unit.source: You can also update your certificates and keys using the <token>secondref_acs</token> Management Portal.
trans-unit.target: You can also update your certificates and keys using the <token>secondref_acs</token> Management Portal.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="dea613c9-e35c-4731-9411-e7937837b3bb" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Certificates and Keys Management Guidelines</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="dea613c9-e35c-4731-9411-e7937837b3bb" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Certificates and Keys Management Guidelines</link>.

trans-unit.source: Prerequisites
trans-unit.target: Prerequisites

trans-unit.source: To run this sample, you will need:
trans-unit.target: To run this sample, you will need:

trans-unit.source: An account at the Azure homepage and an <token>ad_acs_namespace</token>.
trans-unit.target: An account at the Azure homepage and an <token>ad_acs_namespace</token>.

trans-unit.source: <token>vs2010</token> (any version).
trans-unit.target: <token>vs2010</token> (any version).

trans-unit.source: For more details, see <externalLink><linkText>ACS Prerequisites</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=221065</linkUri></externalLink> (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=221065).
trans-unit.target: For more details, see <externalLink><linkText>ACS Prerequisites</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=221065</linkUri></externalLink> (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=221065).

trans-unit.source: Running the Sample
trans-unit.target: Running the Sample

trans-unit.source: To run the sample
trans-unit.target: To run the sample

trans-unit.source: Click <ui>Management service</ui> and then click the default <ui>ManagementClient</ui> account.
trans-unit.target: Click <ui>Management service</ui> and then click the default <ui>ManagementClient</ui> account.

trans-unit.source: You will see a set of credentials that can be used to access the Management Service.
trans-unit.target: You will see a set of credentials that can be used to access the Management Service.

trans-unit.source: In this sample, we will use the password credential.
trans-unit.target: In this sample, we will use the password credential.

trans-unit.source: To view the password, click <ui>Password</ui> in the credential list.
trans-unit.target: To view the password, click <ui>Password</ui> in the credential list.

trans-unit.source: Copy the password into your clipboard.
trans-unit.target: Copy the password into your clipboard.

trans-unit.source: If you have not done so already, open the sample in <token>vs_current_short</token>.
trans-unit.target: If you have not done so already, open the sample in <token>vs_current_short</token>.

trans-unit.source: In the <ui>Common</ui> project, open the <ui>SamplesConfiguration.cs</ui> file, and locate the following lines of code:
trans-unit.target: In the <ui>Common</ui> project, open the <ui>SamplesConfiguration.cs</ui> file, and locate the following lines of code:

trans-unit.source: Update the value of the <ui>ServiceNamespace</ui> field with the name of your <token>ad_acs_namespace</token>.
trans-unit.target: Update the value of the <ui>ServiceNamespace</ui> field with the name of your <token>ad_acs_namespace</token>.

trans-unit.source: Update the value of the <ui>ManagementServiceIdentityKey</ui> field with the password value in your clipboard.
trans-unit.target: Update the value of the <ui>ManagementServiceIdentityKey</ui> field with the password value in your clipboard.

trans-unit.source: Build the solution.
trans-unit.target: Build the solution.

trans-unit.source: With the ManagementServiceHelper configured, you can start the KeyManagement projects.
trans-unit.target: With the ManagementServiceHelper configured, you can start the KeyManagement projects.
